titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require nursing facilities participating in the medicaid program to pay nursing personnel at a rate at least equal to the mean rate paid nursing personnel employed outside nursing facilities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require nursing facilities to pay nursing personnel at a rate at least equal to the mean rate paid nursing personnel employed outside such facilities.
